message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $150. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. For a limited time, I am offering this exceptional item to you at an exclusive price of $140. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly special at a fantastic discount. If you're interested, please let me know and we can proceed with the transaction right away.
